targets.expr: sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{name!~".*prometheus.*", image!="", container_name!="POD", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor",  namespace="zk-client", pod=~"zk-scenario-.*"}[1m])) by (pod_name, container_name)

sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{name!~".*prometheus.*", image!="", namespace="zk-client", container_name!="POD"}[5m])) by (pod_name, container_name) /
sum(container_spec_cpu_quota{name!~".*prometheus.*", namespace="zk-client", image!="", container_name!="POD"}/container_spec_cpu_period{name!~".*prometheus.*", namespace="zk-client", image!="", container_name!="POD"}) by (pod_name, container_name)
sum by(namespace) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$sofa_shop_namespace", container!="POD", image!=""})
sum by(namespace) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="zk-client", container!="POD", image!="", pod=~"zk-scenario-.*"})
sum by(namespace) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="pl", container!="POD", image!="", pod=~"vizier-pem.*"})
